description: To locate your CSUTIL folders, follow these steps: Open the Finder window and double-click the Utilities folder under Applications. Right-click the ColorSync Utility application icon. Select Show Package Contents → Contents → Resources , the folders will be located in this folder.

common_filenames.description: Calculator.csutil - Data files are contained for the calculator in this folder.
Devices.csutil - Data files are contained for devices in this folder.
Filters.csutil - Data files are contained in this folder for filters.
FirstAid.csutil - Data files are contained in this folder for First Aid.
Profiles.csutil - Data files are contained in this folder for profiles.
